message.content:
cs.DM, cs.FL, cs.IT, cs.LO, cs.NA. 

The paper deals with the critical exponent of infinite words, which is a topic in discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The paper specifically focuses on automatic sequences, which are a type of formal language and therefore fall under the category of formal languages and automata theory (cs.FL). The paper also involves the computation of values, which is a common theme in information theory (cs.IT) and numerical analysis (cs.NA). Additionally, the paper involves the study of recurrence relations, which is a topic in both discrete mathematics and computer science (cs.LO).
